ayahs.textUthmani: وَمِنْهُم مَّن يَنظُرُ إِلَيْكَ ۚ أَفَأَنتَ تَهْدِى ٱلْعُمْىَ وَلَوْ كَانُوا۟ لَا يُبْصِرُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَمِنْهُم [And among them] مَّن [(are some) who] يَنظُرُ [look] إِلَيْكَ ۚ [at you] أَفَأَنتَ [But (can) you] تَهْدِى [guide] ٱلْعُمْىَ [the blind] وَلَوْ [even though] كَانُوا۟ [they [were]] لَا [(do) not] يُبْصِرُونَ [see]
ayahs.transliteration: Waminhum man yanthuru ilaykaafaanta tahdee alAAumya walaw kanoo la yubsiroon

ayahs.textUthmani: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَظْلِمُ ٱلنَّاسَ شَيْـًٔا وَلَـٰكِنَّ ٱلنَّاسَ أَنفُسَهُمْ يَظْلِمُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: إِنَّ [Indeed] ٱللَّهَ [Allah] لَا [(does) not] يَظْلِمُ [wrong] ٱلنَّاسَ [the people] شَيْـًۭٔا [(in) anything] وَلَـٰكِنَّ [but] ٱلنَّاسَ [the people] أَنفُسَهُمْ [wrong themselves] يَظْلِمُونَ [wrong themselves]
ayahs.transliteration: Inna Allaha la yathlimuannasa shay-an walakinna annasaanfusahum yathlimoon

ayahs.textUthmani: وَيَوْمَ يَحْشُرُهُمْ كَأَن لَّمْ يَلْبَثُوٓا۟ إِلَّا سَاعَةً مِّنَ ٱلنَّهَارِ يَتَعَارَفُونَ بَيْنَهُمْ ۚ قَدْ خَسِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِلِقَآءِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُهْتَدِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَيَوْمَ [And the Day] يَحْشُرُهُمْ [He will gather them] كَأَن [as if] لَّمْ [they had not remained] يَلْبَثُوٓا۟ [they had not remained] إِلَّا [except] سَاعَةًۭ [an hour] مِّنَ [of] ٱلنَّهَارِ [the day] يَتَعَارَفُونَ [they will recognize each other] بَيْنَهُمْ ۚ [between them] قَدْ [Certainly] خَسِرَ [(will have) lost] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] كَذَّبُوا۟ [denied] بِلِقَآءِ [the meeting] ٱللَّهِ [(with) Allah] وَمَا [and not] كَانُوا۟ [they were] مُهْتَدِينَ [the guided ones]
ayahs.transliteration: Wayawma yahshuruhum kaan lamyalbathoo illa saAAatan mina annahariyataAAarafoona baynahum qad khasira allatheena kaththaboobiliqa-i Allahi wama kanoo muhtadeen

ayahs.textUthmani: وَإِمَّا نُرِيَنَّكَ بَعْضَ ٱلَّذِى نَعِدُهُمْ أَوْ نَتَوَفَّيَنَّكَ فَإِلَيْنَا مَرْجِعُهُمْ ثُمَّ ٱللَّهُ شَهِيدٌ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَإِمَّا [And whether] نُرِيَنَّكَ [We show you] بَعْضَ [some] ٱلَّذِى [(of) that which] نَعِدُهُمْ [We promised them] أَوْ [or] نَتَوَفَّيَنَّكَ [We cause you to die] فَإِلَيْنَا [then to Us] مَرْجِعُهُمْ [(is) their return] ثُمَّ [then] ٱللَّهُ [Allah] شَهِيدٌ [(is) a Witness] عَلَىٰ [over] مَا [what] يَفْعَلُونَ [they do]
ayahs.transliteration: Wa-imma nuriyannaka baAAdaallathee naAAiduhum aw natawaffayannaka fa-ilaynamarjiAAuhum thumma Allahu shaheedun AAala mayafAAaloon

ayahs.textUthmani: وَلِكُلِّ أُمَّةٍ رَّسُولٌ ۖ فَإِذَا جَآءَ رَسُولُهُمْ قُضِىَ بَيْنَهُم بِٱلْقِسْطِ وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَلِكُلِّ [And for every] أُمَّةٍۢ [nation] رَّسُولٌۭ ۖ [(is) a Messenger] فَإِذَا [So when] جَآءَ [comes] رَسُولُهُمْ [their Messenger] قُضِىَ [it will be judged] بَيْنَهُم [between them] بِٱلْقِسْطِ [in justice] وَهُمْ [and they] لَا [(will) not] يُظْلَمُونَ [be wronged]
ayahs.transliteration: Walikulli ommatin rasoolun fa-itha jaarasooluhum qudiya baynahum bilqisti wahum layuthlamoon

ayahs.textUthmani: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَيَقُولُونَ [And they say] مَتَىٰ [When] هَـٰذَا [(will) this] ٱلْوَعْدُ [the promise (be fulfilled)] إِن [if] كُنتُمْ [you are] صَـٰدِقِينَ [truthful]
ayahs.transliteration: Wayaqooloona mata hathaalwaAAdu in kuntum sadiqeen

ayahs.textUthmani: قُل لَّآ أَمْلِكُ لِنَفْسِى ضَرًّا وَلَا نَفْعًا إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۗ لِكُلِّ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلٌ ۚ إِذَا جَآءَ أَجَلُهُمْ فَلَا يَسْتَـْٔخِرُونَ سَاعَةً ۖ وَلَا يَسْتَقْدِمُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: قُل [Say] لَّآ [Not] أَمْلِكُ [I have power] لِنَفْسِى [for myself] ضَرًّۭا [(for) any harm] وَلَا [and not] نَفْعًا [(for) any profit] إِلَّا [except] مَا [what] شَآءَ [Allah wills] ٱللَّهُ ۗ [Allah wills] لِكُلِّ [For every] أُمَّةٍ [nation] أَجَلٌ ۚ [(is) a term] إِذَا [When] جَآءَ [comes] أَجَلُهُمْ [their term] فَلَا [then not] يَسْتَـْٔخِرُونَ [they remain behind] سَاعَةًۭ ۖ [an hour] وَلَا [and not] يَسْتَقْدِمُونَ [they can precede (it)]
ayahs.transliteration: Qul la amliku linafsee darranwala nafAAan illa ma shaa Allahulikulli ommatin ajalun itha jaa ajaluhum falayasta/khiroona saAAatan wala yastaqdimoon

ayahs.textUthmani: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَتَىٰكُمْ عَذَابُهُۥ بَيَـٰتًا أَوْ نَهَارًا مَّاذَا يَسْتَعْجِلُ مِنْهُ ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: قُلْ [Say] أَرَءَيْتُمْ [Do you see] إِنْ [if] أَتَىٰكُمْ [comes to you] عَذَابُهُۥ [His punishment] بَيَـٰتًا [(by) night] أَوْ [or] نَهَارًۭا [(by) day] مَّاذَا [what (portion)] يَسْتَعْجِلُ [of it would (wish to) hasten] مِنْهُ [of it would (wish to) hasten] ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ [the criminals]
ayahs.transliteration: Qul araaytum in atakum AAathabuhubayatan aw naharan matha yastaAAjilu minhualmujrimoon

ayahs.textUthmani: أَثُمَّ إِذَا مَا وَقَعَ ءَامَنتُم بِهِۦٓ ۚ ءَآلْـَٔـٰنَ وَقَدْ كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: أَثُمَّ [Is (it) then] إِذَا [when] مَا [when] وَقَعَ [(it had) occurred] ءَامَنتُم [you (will) believe] بِهِۦٓ ۚ [in it] ءَآلْـَٔـٰنَ [Now] وَقَدْ [And certainly] كُنتُم [you were] بِهِۦ [seeking to hasten it] تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ [seeking to hasten it]
ayahs.transliteration: Athumma itha ma waqaAAa amantumbihi al-ana waqad kuntum bihi tastaAAjiloon

ayahs.textUthmani: ثُمَّ قِيلَ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ ذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابَ ٱلْخُلْدِ هَلْ تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَكْسِبُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: ثُمَّ [Then] قِيلَ [it will be said] لِلَّذِينَ [to those who] ظَلَمُوا۟ [wronged] ذُوقُوا۟ [Taste] عَذَابَ [punishment] ٱلْخُلْدِ [the everlasting] هَلْ [Are you (being) recompensed] تُجْزَوْنَ [Are you (being) recompensed] إِلَّا [except] بِمَا [for what] كُنتُمْ [you used (to)] تَكْسِبُونَ [earn]
ayahs.transliteration: Thumma qeela lillatheena thalamoothooqoo AAathaba alkhuldi hal tujzawna illabima kuntum taksiboon

ayahs.textUthmani: ۞ وَيَسْتَنۢبِـُٔونَكَ أَحَقٌّ هُوَ ۖ قُلْ إِى وَرَبِّىٓ إِنَّهُۥ لَحَقٌّ ۖ وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعْجِزِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: ۞ وَيَسْتَنۢبِـُٔونَكَ [And they ask you to inform] أَحَقٌّ [Is it true] هُوَ ۖ [Is it true] قُلْ [Say] إِى [Yes] وَرَبِّىٓ [by my Lord] إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed, it] لَحَقٌّۭ ۖ [(is) surely the truth] وَمَآ [and not] أَنتُم [you] بِمُعْجِزِينَ [(can) escape (it)]
ayahs.transliteration: Wayastanbi-oonaka ahaqqun huwa qul eewarabbee innahu lahaqqun wama antum bimuAAjizeen

words.translation: And they ask you to inform
